document.full_text: the i.m.f. warned that greece's drive to shore up its troubled finances would fail unless it accelerated its economic overhaul, and portugal's short-term borrowing costs rose again.
document.title: pressure builds for greece and portugal despite bailouts
lines_and_colors: the i.m.f. warned that greece's drive to shore up its troubled finances would fail unless it accelerated its economic overhaul, and portugal's short-term borrowing costs rose again.
